- Location: Under kitchen sink; wall behind with tile backing.
- Materials: White PVC drain/P-trap with black plastic tailpiece; chrome angle-stop shutoffs; copper supply lines.
- Condition: Wall behind sink shows missing tile and exposed substrate/backer board; possible moisture damage.
- Floor: Concrete floor with visible staining near cabinet base; potential past water intrusion.
- Notes: No active leaks evident in photo; inspect trap seals and wall repair recommended.
